name: Himalayan Breeze Jacket (Managed)
description:
The Himalayan Breeze Jacket is a testament to Peak Pulse's commitment to blending traditional craftsmanship with modern performance. Sourced and updated via the new admin CMS. Constructed from a unique, breathable fabric woven in the Kathmandu valley, this jacket offers exceptional comfort and protection against the elements.

Its minimalist design is accented with subtle traditional motifs, making it a versatile piece for any wardrobe. Features include secure zip pockets, an adjustable hood, and ethically sourced trims.
fabricDetails: Outer Shell: 70% Recycled Polyester, 30% Himalayan Nettle (Allo) fiber. Lining: 100% Organic Cotton.
careInstructions: Machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Hang dry. Do not bleach. Iron on low heat if necessary.
sustainabilityMetrics: Made with 70% recycled materials. Ethically produced by Fair Trade certified artisans in Nepal.
fitGuide: Standard fit. Model is 6'0" (183cm) and wears size Medium.
